statements: SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, symbol, high_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol LIKE 'GOO%' ORDER BY open_price ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, date, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, MIN(low_price) AS min_low_price, MAX(high_price) AS max_high_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY symbol HAVING avg_close_price > 200 ORDER BY avg_close_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM stock_prices;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, volume, date FROM stock_prices WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume, date FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price, volume, date FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 10000 AND date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT symbol, price, investment_strategy FROM stock_prices JOIN investment_opportunities ON stock_prices.symbol = investment_opportunities.symbol WHERE date >= opportunity_date AND price >= 100 ORDER BY investment_strategy ASC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(volume) AS max_volume FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol HAVING avg_price > 50 AND max_volume > 50000;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_count, MAX(date) AS latest_date FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY latest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol='AAPL'
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE date='2021-10-15'
SELECT symbol, trend_type FROM stock_trends ORDER BY trend_score DESC
SELECT * FROM investment_opportunities WHERE symbol='GOOGL' AND trend_score > 8.5
SELECT opportunity_id, description, potential_return FROM investment_opportunities
SELECT symbol, price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, trend_type, trend_score FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_score > 0.8 ORDER BY trend_score DESC;

SELECT opportunity_id, symbol, description, trend_score, potential_return FROM investment_opportunities WHERE potential_return > 0.1 AND trend_score > 0.5 ORDER BY potential_return DESC, trend_score ASC;
SELECT symbol, price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_type = 'bullish' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices;
SELECT ticker, open_price, close_price FROM StockPrices WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT id, ticker, exchange FROM StockSymbols WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT id, trend_score, trend_date FROM TrendAnalysis ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT id, opportunity_type, investment_amount FROM InvestmentOpportunities WHERE investment_amount > 1000000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC;
SELECT ticker, open_price, close_price FROM StockPrices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT s.ticker, s.company_name, t.trend_score FROM StockSymbols s JOIN TrendAnalysis t ON s.id = t.stock_id WHERE t.trend_score >= 4.5;

SELECT ss.ticker, io.opportunity_type, io.investment_amount FROM StockSymbols ss JOIN InvestmentOpportunities io ON ss.id = io.stock_id WHERE io.investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY io.investment_amount DESC;
SELECT sp.date, sp.open_price, sp.close_price, ts.exchange FROM StockPrices sp JOIN StockSymbols ts ON sp.ticker = ts.ticker WHERE sp.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sp.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_date FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, stock_date FROM stocks WHERE stock_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT s.stock_symbol, p.price FROM stocks s INNER JOIN stock_prices p ON s.stock_id = p.stock_id WHERE p.price > 50 ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT s.stock_symbol, t.trend_type FROM stocks s INNER JOIN stock_trends t ON s.stock_id = t.stock_id WHERE t.trend_date < '2023-01-01';
